## MarkerTechniqueParams.text property

Text to be displayed for feature.

Defaults to first defined: - feature property `label` if present in technique (deprecated) - `["get", "name:short"]` is `useAbbreviation` is true - `["get", "iso_code"]` is `useIsoCode` is true - `["get", "name:$LANGUAGE"]` for each specified language - `["get", "name"]`

See \[\[ExtendedTileInfo.getFeatureText\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
text?: DynamicProperty<string>;
```
